message.body: Thanks Kathryn <3 I appreciate it, this is really hard.

It's awful. More so because he was such an amazing dog and friend. Try to focus on all the love he shared with everyone. We were lucky to know him for the time we did. So sorry again and please reach out of I can do anything. Jake also sends his regards.
Oh Kathryn, thank you so much for that. I am really trying to believe it.
